Title: Death and Waxes
Description:
Kobolds take candles seriously. Wax, even more. More important than gold. More important than freedom!

We steal candles from Candle King. We make him look weak. Bully that looks weak loses control. Gets dead!

Also means we not have to wait out here in dark until get eaten. Hurry!
ObjectivesText: Recover Flickerflame Candles from around the Lost Mines.
RewardText:
<Skitter visibly relaxes in the presence of the candles.>

Ah, good. Now get me out of this!
